data.body: Document that each git worktree needs dependency bootstrap (bun install --frozen-lockfile) before lint/typecheck/test, and prefer bun run over bunx for local plugin resolution.
data.description: Document that each git worktree needs dependency bootstrap (bun install --frozen-lockfile) before lint/typecheck/test, and prefer bun run over bunx for local plugin resolution.
data.title: Add worktree dependency bootstrap guidance for agents
